Uyghur Pop

Mar 29, 2006

Via Michael Manning,

the group that’s been bringing down the house in Uyghur discos all over Xinjiang, all the way from Uzbekistan, the beautiful girls of [Insert Band Name Here].

He doesn’t know the name of the band, and the video is very low budget, to say the least, but it is great to have a glimpse of another culture. I was in Xinjiang in 1990 and I’d love to go back!

</embed>

He has another video here, and lots more great stuff about life and culture in Xinjiang on his blog.

(via Asiapundit)

PS: Can a day go by during which I don’t have to add another blog to my list of things to read …
